description.schinese: 一轮游戏偷窃价值$10,000的道具
description.tchinese: 在一場攻略旅程中偷取價值$10,000以上的貨物

description.japanese: 1回の通しプレイで10,000ドル相当の盗みを働く

description.english: Collect a bounty for turning in either Leila, Shelby Cross or Galen Weeks
